skewed.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an opinion, piece of information, result etc that is skewed is incorrect, especially because it has been affected by a particular thing or because you do not know all the facts
skewed.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The mediaâ€™s coverage of the election has been skewed from the very beginning.
skewed.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is skewed is not straight and is higher on one side than the other
skewed.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The picture on the wall was slightly skewed.
